item.title: R.E.P.O.
item.description:
Title: R.E.P.O.
Genre: Action , Early Access
Developer: semiwork
Publisher: semiwork
Release Date: Feb 26, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 26, 2025




About This Game



R.E.P.O. is an online co-op horror game featuring physics, proximity voice chat and scary monsters. You and up to 5 friends can venture into terrifying environments to extract valuable objects using your physics-based grabbing tool.


Even the monsters are affected by Newton's law of gravity!
Under the employ of a mysterious computer intelligence. It is your job to locate, transport and extract valuable items from the haunted remains of a long lost humanity.


...but know when to stay quiet.
Transport anything from heavy pianos to fragile ceramics and use teamwork to make sure that the precious cargo will safely reach its destination.


Robotic enhancements increase your chances!
Use your hard earned cash [SURPLUS] to purchase upgrades and weapons from your heartless [GENEROUS] creator.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Core i5 6600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 970
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1070
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: GBVSR - Deluxe Character Pass 2
item.description:
Title: GBVSR - Deluxe Character Pass 2
Genre: Action
Developer: Cygames, Inc. , Arc System Works
Franchise: Granblue Fantasy
Release Date: Feb 25, 2025




About This Content

Set Contents:

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Sandalphon)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Galleon) (Releasing Spring 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Wilnas) (Releasing Summer 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Meg) (Releasing Fall 2025)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Ilsa) (Releasing Early 2026)

• 4 Color Variants (no. 5–8) for the 5 DLC characters

• 3 Weapon Skins (no. 2–4) for the 5 DLC characters

• New Stage: Canaan Shrine

• Premium Avatar: Sandalphon (Dark)

Notice:

- Some content in this set is also available as a stand-alone purchase. The additional characters included in this set are also purchasable as GBVSR Character Pass 2. Ensure you are not making a duplicate purchase.

- In order to use this content, you will need the full paid game, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

- Content will gradually become available after the game is released.

- This set includes some content that can be obtained separately in the in-game Rupie Shop.

item.title: Company of Heroes 3: Fire & Steel
item.description:
Title: Company of Heroes 3: Fire & Steel
Genre: Action , Strategy
Developer: Relic Entertainment
Publisher: Relic Entertainment
Franchise: Company of Heroes
Release Date: Feb 25, 2025




About This Content

Company of Heroes 3: Fire and Steel is a Battlegroup DLC pack consisting of four Battlegroups for Multiplayer and Co-Op/ skirmish vs AI.

US Forces – Heavy Weapons Battlegroup

Superior team weapons and halftracks control the battlefield before heavy armor arrives to finish the fight.

Requisition .50 cal heavy machine guns or off-map batteries of the devastating Black Dragon howitzer as part of Weapons Team support, or call in the Cavalry, with Assault half-track variants, 3-inch towed Anti-tank guns, and the implacable M26 Pershing heavy tank.

Wehrmacht – Terror Battlegroup

Shatter the enemy’s willpower with airstrikes, suppression and superior infantry tactics. Devastating heavy weapons will destroy anything that remains standing.

Use unorthodox Terror Tactics such as field interrogations, the Stuka’s iconic Jericho Trumpet, or V1 Rocket Strikes to force the enemy from the field, or show the enemy no quarter with Weapon Superiority and the King Tiger heavy tank.

British Forces – Canadian Shock Battlegroup

Seize territory to gain unparalleled momentum on the battlefield, and deploy powerful incendiary weapons to displace any who dare deny your movement.

Call upon Canadian Shock Sections and aggressive battlefield tactics to secure ground in a Shock Assault, or deny the enemy what they stubbornly refuse to cede with Incendiary Weapons, including the indefatigable Churchill Crocodile.

Afrikakorps – Panzerjäger Kommand Battlegroup

Cripple the enemy’s advance with defensive obstacles, enabling powerful anti-armor weapons to make the killing blow.

Use Stalling tactics, including Roadblocks, Minefields and Defensive Positions to buy the time you need to deploy your forces; elite Tank Busters and Tank Hunting tactics including the Elefant Tank Destroyer will crush even the strongest enemy armor.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Features realistic top-down depictions of WW2 warfare. Violence is frequent and detailed.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5 6th-gen or AMD Ryzen desktop processor with 4 cores @3GHz, or equivalent performance
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950, AMD Radeon R9 370, or equivalent performance
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 40 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel i7 8th-gen or AMD Ryzen desktop processor with 8 cores @ 3GHz or equivalent performance
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, AMD Radeon RX 5600, or equivalent performance
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 40 GB available space

item.title: Cafemart Simulator
item.description:
Title: Cafemart Simulator
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Romenics , Artaani
Publisher: Science Interactive
Release Date: Feb 25, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 25, 2025




About This Game

Build, decorate, and manage your own cozy café, where guests can relax in a warm and welcoming atmosphere while enjoying delicious pastries, freshly brewed coffee, and a variety of treats.

At the same time, develop a supermarket filled with hundreds of detailed and appealing items. Organize the space by placing shelves, refrigerators, and freezers. Set optimal prices and create a comfortable shopping experience for customers by providing baskets, carts, and efficient checkout service.

Play solo or team up with friends in cooperative multiplayer!

An intuitive building menu, grid placement system, the ability to paint floors and walls, and a flexible table customization system in the cafe allow you to design your establishment with maximum precision and create your own unique style.

You can also customize your character's appearance to highlight your personal style in cooperative mode. It gets even more exciting with the option to switch between first-person and third-person views to see your character and their style from every angle.

Choose from several unique locations to open your business, each inspired by different corners of the world. Currently, you can enjoy the charm of a North American city with mid-rise buildings or feel the nostalgia of an Eastern European city with its recognizable panel buildings, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the desired theme.

You can create your own sign for your establishment by uploading an image from your computer or using a web link to place any image from the internet. For example, you can upload the logo of your local cafe or store and role-play as its owner.

You can also select one of several real currencies to see familiar banknotes, prices, and symbols, adding realism and helping you dive deeper into the atmosphere.

Dynamic day-night cycles, realistic weather effects, and beautifully rendered night cityscapes with lit streets and bustling traffic create an atmospheric environment. You can feel the coziness of your cafe while rain falls outside in the nighttime city, illuminated by passing cars.

For even greater immersion, the game features a music player with original compositions in various styles, perfectly complementing the atmosphere.

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

Music tracks, app icon



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or similar
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ou AMD Radeon RX 460 or similar
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 ou AMD Radeon RX 580 or similar
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 10 GB available space

item.title: I Just Want to be Single!! Season One
item.description:
Title: I Just Want to be Single!! Season One
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , Early Access
Developer: m. , Tsundere Studio
Publisher: Tsundere Studio
Release Date: Feb 24, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 24, 2025




About This Game

A dating sim where you avoid cute babes instead of dating them?!

You are Aya - a new transfer student that wants nothing more than to start fresh in your final year of high school. New school, new people, making friends will DEFINITELY work this time! But it seems like some of your new classmates want more than simple friendship...

Survive highschool

You don't want to graduate highschool without a single friend, but become too close with someone and you might cause a misunderstanding! You'll need to balance your affection level in order to avoid getting heartbreak or heartache!

Cutscenes that pop off the page

Watch events play out with professionally hand drawn, animated manga cutscenes!

Meet your new classmates

Key Features:

  • Play as a non-binary, ace/aro protagonist!
  • Animated Manga Cutscenes
  • Make difficult decisions and balance your affection
  • Multiple unique endings where you date, or befriend each girl, or all of them at the same time! (And more)
  • Secrets
  • You can't date a skeleton in this game :(
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS
